thread.title: Pink Floyd’s Early Years, 1965-1972 Individual Volumes Announced
thread.title_full: Pink Floyd’s Early Years, 1965-1972 Individual Volumes Announced

author: Evan Minsker
title: Pink Floyd’s Early Years, 1965-1972 Individual Volumes Announced
text:
Pink Floyd’s Early Years, 1965-1972 Individual Volumes Announced Last year’s massive box set is broken down into six smaller packages Pink Floyd Photo by Michael Ochs Archives/Getty Images 
Last year, a massive Pink Floyd box set was released that documented their origins. Pink Floyd: The Early Years, 1965-1972 is a beast: an 11-CD/9-DVD/8 Blu-Ray collection. On March 24, everything from the box set will become available in six individual volumes. The book-bound, multi-disc collections are broken up by year: 1965-1967 ( CAMBRIDGE ST/ATION ), 1968 ( GERMIN/ATION ), 1969 ( DRAMATIS/ATION ), 1970 ( DEVI/ATION ), 1971 ( REVERBER/ATION ), and 1972 ( OBFUSC/ATION ). Find pre-order information and full details of the individual collections here . 
Read Pitchfork’s review of The Early Years, 1965-1972 . Artists In This Story
